attributes.action: Increase the funding for and access to Mental Health resources within the UK
attributes.additional_details: Increase funding to help develop resources for those suffering diagnosed and not yet diagnosed mental health conditions and allow quicker access to assessments and therapy within the NHS. Don't let one more person become a statistic of suicide.
attributes.background: Suffering from mental health problems and trying to get full and comprehensive assessments followed by the appropriate therapy within the NHS is like waiting for snow in the middle of a heat wave. You can go private but the costs are astronomical so basically you can get well if you can pay for it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581222
